name: ZEN (itch) (Ashwin K)
description:
Brace all of your 6 senses and prepare for a journey inward. Zen is a 2D Maze game where you navigate your consciousness through various scenarios and obstacles to reach serenity. You must travel the through multiple dimensions, traverse intricate mazes and face your worst fears. You must conquer a world where one slip up, one wrong move would mean certain death .There are 5 Chapters, each with a number of levels to overcome.

Chapter 1: Denial

Chapter 2: Anger

Chapter 3: Bargaining

Chapter 4: Depression

Chapter 5: Acceptance
